item.title: Nio Retail Buzz Soars As Stock Snags Price Target Hike On Cheaper Mass Market EV’s Potential
item.description: Analysts said the lower pricing makes the third-generation ES8 more competitive against rivals like Li Auto’s L9 and the upcoming Zeekr 9X.

item.title: Indian Markets Open Weak After Six-Day Rally, Nifty Slips Below 25,000; Financials, Metals Drag
item.description: Analysts suggest a buy-on-dips strategy for the Nifty. Investors now await US Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s Jackson Hole speech for global cues.
